Dingzhou county level city in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

sentences.english: Sixteen Kingdoms period, the Northern Yan in Dingzhou its capital.
sentences.chinese: 十六國時期，北燕在定州建都。

sentences.english: Dingzhou porcelain is usually creamy white, though it is also made in other colours.
sentences.chinese: 定州陶瓷乳白色，當然其中也有其它顏色。
